<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncachetracker/#af0133d1b9ef17413abc75877deb27b9e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncachetracker/#af0133d1b9ef17413abc75877deb27b9e">AssumptionCacheTracker::verifyAnalysis</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: In the long term the verifier should not be controllable with a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// flag. We should either fix all passes to correctly update the assumption</span></CodeLine>
